description: I've been fantasizing about tasting Angelo's cum for a while now. The best way to achieve this was to ask my friend Vinna to invite him to a tricked photo session. As I gave her secret instructions through a hidden ear-piece, her goal was to make him fuck her and collect a good sample of his cum so I can taste it afterwards. In case it didn't work as planned, she would have to use her ultimate weapon, the HypnoMask...
title: Hot Jock Naughty Plot, Scene #01
